channel.title: CVE Feed for Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark

item.title: CVE-2023-2906|2024-10-02T14:37:16.471Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Due to a failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted CP2179 packet, Wireshark versions 2.0.0 through 4.0.7 is susceptible to a divide by zero allowing for a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-8645|2024-09-10T10:02:16.798Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: SPRT dissector crash in Wireshark 4.2.0 to 4.0.5 and 4.0.0 to 4.0.15 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2024-4854|2024-08-29T15:04:58.774Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: MONGO and ZigBee TLV dissector infinite loops in Wireshark 4.2.0 to 4.2.4, 4.0.0 to 4.0.14, and 3.6.0 to 3.6.22 allow denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2024-8250|2024-08-29T15:05:01.394Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: NTLMSSP dissector crash in Wireshark 4.2.0 to 4.0.6 and 4.0.0 to 4.0.16 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
